theThief:Lie.NAME: Lie
theThief:Lie.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! vulnerable to ALL enemies.
theThief:Lie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theThief:BouqetOKnives.NAME: Bouqet-O-Knives
theThief:BouqetOKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.
theThief:BouqetOKnives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

theThief:SharpPractice.NAME: Sharp Practice
theThief:SharpPractice.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn add !M! random thethief:Stolen card to your hand.
theThief:SharpPractice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn add !M! random thethief:Stolen card to your hand.

theThief:Ransack.NAME: Ransack
theThief:Ransack.DESCRIPTION: thethief:Discover a thethief:Stolen card. NL thethief:Steal it, and add !M! copies of it to your hand.
theThief:Ransack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thethief:Discover a thethief:Stolen card. NL thethief:Steal it, and add !M! copies of it to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 out of 3 thethief:Stolen cards and add !M! copy of it to your hand.

theThief:IllGottenGains.NAME: Ill Gotten Gains
theThief:IllGottenGains.DESCRIPTION: For the rest of this combat, all thethief:Stolen cards you gain are Upgraded.
theThief:IllGottenGains.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL For the rest of this combat, all thethief:Stolen cards you gain are Upgraded.

theThief:SimilarSkills.NAME: Similar Skills
theThief:SimilarSkills.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Green card to your deck. It costs 0 this combat.
theThief:SimilarSkills.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Upgraded Green card to your deck. It costs 0 this combat.

theThief:DramaticFeign.NAME: Dramatic Feign
theThief:DramaticFeign.DESCRIPTION: Stun and apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL You cannot play cards for the rest of this turn. NL The first card you play next turn is refunded.

theThief:Shadowstep.NAME: Shadowstep
theThief:Shadowstep.DESCRIPTION: thethief:Shadowstep !M! time. NL Shuffle a copy of this card into your deck. Exhaust.
theThief:Shadowstep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL thethief:Shadowstep !M! time. NL Shuffle a copy of this card into your deck. Exhaust.

theThief:SwiftTread.NAME: Swift Tread
theThief:SwiftTread.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle 1 Void into your draw pile.
theThief:SwiftTread.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle 1 Void into your draw pile.

theThief:BeautifulLies.NAME: Beautiful Lies
theThief:BeautifulLies.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your deck, permanently. NL Exhaust. NL Soulbound.
theThief:BeautifulLies.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your deck, permanently. NL Exhaust. NL Soulbound.

theThief:SerratedDagger.NAME: Serrated Dagger
theThief:SerratedDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Goes through Block.
theThief:SerratedDagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Goes through Block.

theThief:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
theThief:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has any Debuff, gain 1 [E] and draw !M! card next turn.
theThief:Exploit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has any Debuff, gain 1 [E] and draw !M! card next turn.

theThief:Follow-up.NAME: Follow-up
theThief:Follow-up.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
theThief:Follow-up.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theThief:OneStepAhead.NAME: One Step Ahead
theThief:OneStepAhead.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, thethief:Shadowstep !M! time. Otherwise, deal !D! damage !theThief:Magic! times instead.
theThief:OneStepAhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, thethief:Shadowstep !M! times. Otherwise, deal !D! damage !theThief:Magic! times instead.

theThief:HideInTheShadows.NAME: Hide In The Shadows
theThief:HideInTheShadows.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ethereal. NL Has Exhaust if you’ve played an attack this turn.
theThief:HideInTheShadows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ethereal. NL Has Exhaust if you’ve played an attack this turn.

theThief:ShadowCloak.NAME: Shadow Cloak
theThief:ShadowCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase this card's block by !M! for the rest of this combat.
theThief:ShadowCloak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase this card's block by !M! for the rest of this combat.

theThief:Darts.NAME: Darts
theThief:Darts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each skill played this combat.
theThief:Darts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each skill played this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: (You have not played any skills yet.)

theThief:Mercy.NAME: Mercy
theThief:Mercy.DESCRIPTION: Heal an enemy for !M! HP, then do !D! damage to it.
theThief:Mercy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal an enemy for !M! HP, then do !D! damage to it.

theThief:Gut.NAME: Gut
theThief:Gut.DESCRIPTION: Add !theThief:Magic! Voids to your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.
theThief:Gut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !theThief:Magic! Voids to your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

theThief:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
theThief:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Void to your draw pile. NL Deal damage equal to 20% of a monster's current HP. NL Exhaust.
theThief:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Void to your draw pile. NL Deal damage equal to  30% of a monster's current HP. NL Exhaust.

theThief:ShadowCalamity.NAME: Shadow Calamity
theThief:ShadowCalamity.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Add !M! Void to your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Grave NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
theThief:ShadowCalamity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Startup: Add !M! Voids to your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Grave. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theThief:HeartBreaker.NAME: Heart Breaker
theThief:HeartBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Weak and Vulnerable, deals double damage.
theThief:HeartBreaker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Weak and Vulnerable, deals double damage.

theThief:PaydayLoan.NAME: Payday Loan
theThief:PaydayLoan.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play is refunded. NL Add !M! void to your draw pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
theThief:PaydayLoan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next card you play is refunded. NL Add !M! void to your draw pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theThief:ShadowReserves.NAME: Shadow Reserves
theThief:ShadowReserves.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card from your draw pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
theThief:ShadowReserves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! cards from your draw, discard, or exhaust pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theThief:SteakOut.NAME: Steak Out
theThief:SteakOut.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Add 1 Void to your draw and discard piles. NL Autoplay: Gain !M! [E] .
theThief:SteakOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Startup: Add 1 Void to your draw and discard piles. NL Autoplay: Gain !M! [E] .

theThief:Gaslight.NAME: Gaslight
theThief:Gaslight.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL You gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
theThief:Gaslight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. You gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theThief:Multitask.NAME: Multitask
theThief:Multitask.DESCRIPTION: Discard !theThief:Magic! cards. thethief:Shadowstep 1 time. NL thethief:Steal !M! cards.
theThief:Multitask.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard !theThief:Magic! card. thethief:Shadowstep 1 time. NL thethief:Steal !M! cards.

theThief:LieInWait.NAME: Lie In Wait
theThief:LieInWait.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Add !M! void to your draw pile. NL Gain !B! block. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
theThief:LieInWait.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Startup: Add !M! void to your draw pile. NL Gain !B! block. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theThief:ThousandBallBearings.NAME: 1000 Ball Bearings
theThief:ThousandBallBearings.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Exhaust.
theThief:ThousandBallBearings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.  NL Exhaust.

theThief:FindersKeepers.NAME: Finders Keepers

theThief:FindersKeepers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add the next non-gray card you play to your deck, permanently. Fleeting.

theThief:IAmEverywhere.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thethief:Shadowstep X times for each enemy in combat.

theThief:MurderousIntent.NAME: Murderous Intent
theThief:MurderousIntent.DESCRIPTION: thethief:Shadowstep !theThief:Magic! time. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength.
theThief:MurderousIntent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thethief:Shadowstep !theThief:Magic! time. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength.

theThief:CorrosivePoison.NAME: Corrosive Poison
theThief:CorrosivePoison.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each skill played this combat. NL Apply 2 Frail, 1 Vulnerable, and 2 Poison to a random enemy !M! times.
theThief:CorrosivePoison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each skill played this combat. NL Apply 2 Frail, 1 Vulnerable, and 2 Poison to a random enemy !M! times.

theThief:HuntersInstinct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw until your hand is full. NL Add !M! Voids to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theThief:Bribe.NAME: Bribe

theThief:Bribe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! gold. NL Stun an enemy. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theThief:ShadowImage.NAME: Shadow Image
theThief:ShadowImage.DESCRIPTION: Take all damage you would have taken this turn, at the end of your next turn instead. NL Exhaust.
theThief:ShadowImage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take all damage you would have taken this turn, at the end of your next turn instead.

theThief:Cunning.NAME: Cunning
theThief:Cunning.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! thethief:Stolen card you play this turn is played twice.
theThief:Cunning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! thethief:Stolen cards you play this turn are played twice.

theThief:StormOfSteal.NAME: Storm Of Steal

theThief:StormOfSteal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then, thethief:Steal that many cards. NL Exhaust.

theThief:Liar.NAME: Liar Liar

theThief:Liar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Every time you play a skill, apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.

theThief:ConArtist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you thethief:Steal a card, gain !M! gold.

theThief:Voidbound.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Void, gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.
theThief:Voidbound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Void, gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.

theThief:DissoluteSatisfaction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you deal damage this turn, restore !M! HP. Exhaust.

theThief:Focused.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thethief:Shadowstep !M! times. NL thethief:Non-Backstab cards no longer break Elusive.

theThief:GuiltTrip.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak and it loses !theThief:Magic! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.
theThief:GuiltTrip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak and it loses !theThief:Magic! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.
